article.title: BCC Birds of a Feather Proposals due July 10
article.tease: Build Community at the Bioinformatics Community Conference
article.content:
Birds of a Feather (BoFs) are informal, self-organized meetups focused on specific topics. They are a great way to meet other like-minded community members and have an in-depth discussion on a topic of interest, and they are a highlight of Galaxy conferences

Any BCC2020 participant is welcome to propose a BoF by July 10! All you need is a title, an organizer, and a brief description. BoFs can be scheduled right before and after the main meeting day in both hemispheres.
